title: Obduction

notes: Runs perfectly after lowering graphics to medium and fixing audio glitches by applying this fix: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/943#issuecomment-417854312
title: Obduction

notes:
Xaudio2_7 needs to be added via winecfg for sound to work properly
Low framerate but expected on my older hardware
WINEPREFIX=/path/to/steamapps/compatdata/306760/pfx winecfg
title: Obduction

notes: IN NOW WAY CAN THIS BE HIGHER THAN SILVER. It has performance problems from UE4 very heavy spamming of nvapi64 checks. Wine and Proton CANNOT and DO NOT have the ability to play crucial in-game videos making it worthless to play the game this way. The audio requires a fix.
title: Obduction

notes: Missing full-motion video inserts that contain critical gameplay information (not even the subtitles appear); music stutters and voiceover audio is distorted; all sound effects play at full volume all the time; fullscreen puts the game behind the Ubuntu desktop UI (borderless works as intended); significant FPS drops when walking or looking around. Did not test VR mode.
title: Obduction

notes:
Audio crackling can be fixed by adding a native override for xaudio2_7 (https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/943#issuecomment-417854312), but videos essential to gameplay still aren't visible. Performance is also extremely variable, with frequent stuttering and many long (multiple-second) freezes, especially when entering a new area and for the first few minutes thereafter.

Apart from the stutters and lack of videos, the core gameplay works flawlessly.
title: Obduction

notes: Performance is low with occasional freezes, some crashes
